traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The tortoise can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Withdraw
actions.desc: The tortoise adds 2 to its AC against an attack that would hit it by quickly withdrawing into its shell.
